## â“ What & Why

**The Problem:**
> Users often face challenges when dealing with unconventional README formats.

**Solution:**
This project demonstrates various edge cases.

## ðŸš€ Getting Started

### Prerequisites

- Node.js v18+
- npm or yarn

### Installation

```
npm i weird-case-project
```

No language specified in code block above ^

```javascript
// Multiple code blocks
const x = 1;
```

```python
# Different languages
print("hello")
```

```bash
echo "shell too"
```
